What's makes you think I want to hear something like  this Tim?  I 
certain=
ly do NOT want to hear this king of thing, I was asking  for verification 
=
from what I heard from someone else, SF
 
 
In a message dated 6/9/2010 4:5=
8:43 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
tim@... writes:

 
 
 
I would=
 be cautious accepting responses from a box as gospel. I have had  
contrad=
ictory responses about religion come through, but then again, I align  
mys=
elf much closer with atheism than christianity. 

Many times I feel  that t=
he boxes tell us what we want to hear. Why? I 
could not tell you. It  coul=
d be spirits playing with our heads, or, it could be 
a piece of our  uncon=
scious coming through the radio. This does happen, I 
have recorded the  vo=
ices of people in the same room with me coming through 
with the same speec=
h  patterns (although this happened twice with a Shack 
hack but I haven't =
had it  happen with my Minibox yet). 

So in short, if you ascribe to a bel=
ief  and keep asking pointed questions 
about that belief over and over, do=
 not be  surprised when you hear what you 
believe coming through the  box.=


Tim
